content:
always make positions self-sealing. Nonetheless, these and other com-
mon terms are often used to seal positions against any possible criticism.
When  these  terms  are  used  in  these  ways,  the  resulting  positions  are
empty and can be criticized in the same ways as self-sealing ideologies.
